exceptions.exn: In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : (2 <= b_nat)%nat b := Z.of_nat b_nat : Z Hb : 2 <= b n : nat Unable to unify "?M1485 + ?M1486 = ?M1486 + ?M1485" with "α (S (S n)) * - α n + - (- α (S n) * α (S n)) = 1".

original: intros. unfold Det22. unfold A. simpl. unfold MZ_expo. repeat rewrite Z.add_0_r. apply Z.add_comm.
